Datomisca

Non-Blocking & Scala-ish driver for Datomic

  • Read the Scaladoc
  • See on GitHub
  • Home
  • Philosophy in Details
  • Features in Details
  • Getting Started

Please note Datomisca is beta but already used in an important project at Pellucid company. So we are involved in making it production-ready right now.

Embrace Datomic the Scala way

To begin directly with Datomisca, go to Getting Started


Philosophy in a nutshell

Embrace Datomic principles without compromising it

Enhance Datomic features with Scala flavors


API Features

Reactive transactor API (asynchronous & non-blocking)

Compile-time query validation & in/out parameters inference

Use query as static reusable structures

Static-typed & programmatic schema definition API

Programmatic & type-safe Datomic operations

Type-safe mapping from scala structure to/from Datomic entities


Driver Extensions

Play Framework Integration module Reactive Web framework
